mapper.select:
select oe.id, oe.order_code, oe.user_id, oe.score, oe.content, oe.images, oe.create_date, oe.del_flag, oi.start_date, oi.end_date, oi.total_price, oi.rent_day, oi.order_status, ri.name, ui.name as userName, ui.id_card from order_evaluate oe left join order_info oi on (oi.code = oe.order_code) left join room_info ri on (ri.code = oi.room_code) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oe.user_id) where 1 = 1 and oe.del_flag = '0'
AND oe.order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderEvaluate.orderCode},'%')
AND ri.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderEvaluate.name},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderEvaluate.userName},'%')
order by oe.create_date desc
